This appeal by the State Liquor Authority from an order annulling its decision to grant a retail liquor store licensee permission to remove from one location to another brings up an aspect of the revision of the State’s liquor law by chapter 531 of the Laws of 1964 and of the Moreland Commission’s studies leading to the enactment of that statute not *116consider
